verses.verse: And it came <S%H1961><s%> about in the twelfth <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> year, <S%H8141><s%> in the twelfth <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> [month, <S%H2320><s%>] on the first <S%H259><s%> of the month, that the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> to me saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> take <S%H5375><s%> up a lamentation <S%H7015><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and say <S%H559><s%> to him, 'You compared <S%H1819><s%> yourself to a young <S%H3715><s%> lion <S%H3715><s%> of the nations, <S%H1471><s%> Yet you are like the monster <S%H8577><s%> in the seas; <S%H3220><s%> And you burst <S%H1518><s%> forth <S%H1518><s%> in your rivers, <S%H5104><s%> And muddied <S%H1804><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> with your feet, <S%H7272><s%> And fouled <S%H7511><s%> their rivers. <S%H5104><s%>'"

Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> "Now I will spread <S%H6566><s%> My net <S%H7568><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> you With a company <S%H6951><s%> of many <S%H7227><s%> peoples, <S%H5971><s%> And they shall lift <S%H5927><s%> you up in My net. <S%H2764><s%>

"And I will leave <S%H5203><s%> you on the land; <S%H776><s%> I will cast <S%H2904><s%> you on the open <S%H6440><s%> field. <S%H7704><s%> And I will cause all <S%H3605><s%> the birds <S%H5775><s%> of the heavens <S%H8064><s%> to dwell <S%H7931><s%> on you, And I will satisfy <S%H7646><s%> the beasts <S%H9130><s%> of the whole <S%H3605><s%> earth <S%H776><s%> with you.
"And I will lay <S%H5414><s%> your flesh <S%H1320><s%> on the mountains, <S%H2022><s%> And fill <S%H4390><s%> the valleys <S%H1516><s%> with your refuse. <S%H7419><s%>

"I will also make the land <S%H776><s%> drink <S%H8248><s%> the discharge <S%H6824><s%> of your blood, <S%H1818><s%> As far <S%H413><s%> as the mountains, <S%H2022><s%> And the ravines <S%H650><s%> shall be full <S%H4390><s%> of you.

"And when [I] extinguish <S%H3518><s%> you, I will cover <S%H3680><s%> the heavens, <S%H8064><s%> and darken <S%H6937><s%> their stars; <S%H3556><s%> I will cover <S%H3680><s%> the sun <S%H8121><s%> with a cloud, <S%H6051><s%> And the moon <S%H3394><s%> shall not give <S%H215><s%> its light. <S%H216><s%>

"All <S%H3605><s%> the shining <S%H3974><s%> lights <S%H216><s%> in the heavens <S%H8064><s%> I will darken <S%H6937><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> you And will set <S%H5414><s%> darkness <S%H2822><s%> on your land, <S%H776><s%>" Declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God. <S%H3068><s%>

"I will also trouble <S%H3707><s%> the hearts <S%H3820><s%> of many <S%H7227><s%> peoples, <S%H5971><s%> when I bring <S%H935><s%> your destruction <S%H7667><s%> among the nations, <S%H1471><s%> into lands <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you have not known. <S%H3045><s%>

"And I will make <S%H8074><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> peoples <S%H5971><s%> appalled <S%H8074><s%> at you, and their kings <S%H4428><s%> shall be horribly <S%H9623><s%> afraid <S%H8175><s%> of you when I brandish <S%H5774><s%> My sword <S%H2719><s%> before <S%H5921><s%> <S%H6440><s%> them; and they shall tremble <S%H2729><s%> every moment, <S%H7281><s%> every <S%H376><s%> man <S%H376><s%> for his own life, <S%H5315><s%> on the day <S%H3117><s%> of your fall. <S%H4658><s%>"
For thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> "The sword <S%H2719><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> upon you.

"By the swords <S%H2719><s%> of the mighty <S%H1368><s%> ones <S%H1368><s%> I will cause your multitude <S%H1995><s%> to fall; <S%H5307><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> of them are tyrants <S%H6184><s%> of the nations, <S%H1471><s%> And they shall devastate <S%H7703><s%> the pride <S%H1347><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> And all <S%H3605><s%> its multitude <S%H1995><s%> shall be destroyed. <S%H8045><s%>

"I will also destroy all <S%H6><s%> its cattle <S%H3605><s%> from beside <S%H929><s%> many <S%H5921><s%> waters; <S%H7227><s%> And the foot <S%H4325><s%> of man <S%H7272><s%> shall not muddy <S%H120><s%> them anymore, <S%H1804><s%> And the hoofs <S%H5750><s%> of beasts <S%H6541><s%> shall not muddy <S%H929><s%> them.

"Then <S%H227><s%> I will make their waters <S%H4325><s%> settle, <S%H8257><s%> And will cause their rivers <S%H5104><s%> to run <S%H1980><s%> like oil, <S%H8081><s%>" Declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God. <S%H3068><s%>

"When I make <S%H5414><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> a desolation, <S%H8077><s%> And the land <S%H776><s%> is destitute <S%H8074><s%> of that which <S%H4393><s%> filled <S%H4393><s%> it, When I smite <S%H5221><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> those who live <S%H3427><s%> in it, Then they shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

"This <S%H1931><s%> is a lamentation <S%H7015><s%> and they shall chant <S%H6969><s%> it. The daughters <S%H1323><s%> of the nations <S%H1471><s%> shall chant <S%H6969><s%> it. Over <S%H5921><s%> Egypt <S%H4714><s%> and over <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> her multitude <S%H1995><s%> they shall chant <S%H6969><s%> it," declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God. <S%H3068><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> about in the twelfth <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> year, <S%H8141><s%> on the fifteenth <S%H2568><s%> <S%H6240><s%> of the month, <S%H2320><s%> that the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> to me saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> wail <S%H5091><s%> for the multitude <S%H1995><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and bring <S%H3381><s%> it down, <S%H3381><s%> her and the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of the powerful <S%H117><s%> nations, <S%H1471><s%> to the nether <S%H8482><s%> world, <S%H776><s%> with those who go <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> to the pit; <S%H953><s%>
'Whom <S%H4310><s%> do you surpass <S%H5276><s%> in beauty <S%H5276><s%>? Go <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> and make <S%H7901><s%> your bed <S%H7901><s%> with the uncircumcised. <S%H6189><s%>'

"They shall fall <S%H5307><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of those who are slain <S%H2491><s%> by the sword. <S%H2719><s%> She is given <S%H5414><s%> over to the sword; <S%H2719><s%> they have drawn <S%H4900><s%> her and all <S%H3605><s%> her multitudes <S%H1995><s%> away. <S%H4900><s%>

"The strong <S%H410><s%> among the mighty <S%H1368><s%> ones <S%H1368><s%> shall speak <S%H1696><s%> of him [and] his helpers <S%H1368><s%> from the midst <S%H8432><s%> of Sheol, <S%H7585><s%> 'They have gone <S%H3381><s%> down, <S%H3381><s%> they lie <S%H7901><s%> still, <S%H7901><s%> the uncircumcised, <S%H6189><s%> slain <S%H2491><s%> by the sword. <S%H2719><s%>'

"Assyria <S%H804><s%> is there <S%H8033><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> her company; <S%H6951><s%> her graves <S%H6913><s%> are round <S%H5439><s%> about <S%H5439><s%> her. All <S%H3605><s%> of them are slain, <S%H2491><s%> fallen <S%H5307><s%> by the sword, <S%H2719><s%>

whose <S%H834><s%> graves <S%H6913><s%> are set <S%H5414><s%> in the remotest <S%H3411><s%> parts <S%H3411><s%> of the pit, <S%H953><s%> and her company <S%H6951><s%> is round <S%H5439><s%> about <S%H5439><s%> her grave. <S%H6900><s%> All <S%H3605><s%> of them are slain, <S%H2491><s%> fallen <S%H5307><s%> by the sword, <S%H2719><s%> who <S%H834><s%> spread <S%H5414><s%> terror <S%H2851><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of the living. <S%H2416><s%>

"Elam <S%H5867><s%> is there <S%H8033><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> her multitude <S%H1995><s%> around <S%H5439><s%> her grave; <S%H6900><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> of them slain, <S%H2491><s%> fallen <S%H5307><s%> by the sword, <S%H2719><s%> who <S%H834><s%> went <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> uncircumcised <S%H6189><s%> to the lower <S%H8482><s%> parts <S%H8482><s%> of the earth, <S%H776><s%> who <S%H834><s%> instilled <S%H5414><s%> their terror <S%H2851><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of the living, <S%H2416><s%> and bore <S%H5375><s%> their disgrace <S%H3639><s%> with those who went <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> to the pit. <S%H953><s%>

"They have made <S%H5414><s%> a bed <S%H4904><s%> for her among <S%H8432><s%> the slain <S%H2491><s%> with all <S%H3605><s%> her multitude. <S%H1995><s%> Her graves <S%H6913><s%> are around <S%H5439><s%> it, they are all <S%H3605><s%> uncircumcised, <S%H6189><s%> slain <S%H2491><s%> by the sword <S%H2719><s%> (although <S%H3588><s%> their terror <S%H2851><s%> was instilled <S%H5414><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of the living <S%H2416><s%>), and they bore <S%H5375><s%> their disgrace <S%H3639><s%> with those who go <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> to the pit; <S%H953><s%> they were put <S%H5414><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the slain. <S%H2491><s%>

"Meshech, <S%H4902><s%> Tubal <S%H8422><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> their multitude <S%H1995><s%> are there; <S%H8033><s%> their graves <S%H6913><s%> surround <S%H5439><s%> them. All <S%H3605><s%> of them were slain <S%H9135><s%> by the sword <S%H2719><s%> uncircumcised, <S%H6189><s%> though <S%H3588><s%> they instilled <S%H5414><s%> their terror <S%H2851><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of the living. <S%H2416><s%>

"Nor <S%H3808><s%> do they lie <S%H7901><s%> beside <S%H854><s%> the fallen <S%H5307><s%> heroes <S%H1368><s%> of the uncircumcised, <S%H6189><s%> who <S%H834><s%> went <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> to Sheol <S%H7585><s%> with their weapons <S%H3627><s%> of war, <S%H4421><s%> and whose swords <S%H2719><s%> were laid <S%H5414><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> their heads; <S%H7218><s%> but the punishment <S%H5771><s%> for their iniquity <S%H5771><s%> rested <S%H1961><s%> on their bones, <S%H6106><s%> though <S%H3588><s%> the terror <S%H2851><s%> of [these] heroes <S%H1368><s%> [was] once in the land <S%H776><s%> of the living. <S%H2416><s%>
"But in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the uncircumcised <S%H6189><s%> you will be broken <S%H7665><s%> and lie <S%H7901><s%> with those slain <S%H2491><s%> by the sword. <S%H2719><s%>

"There <S%H8033><s%> also is Edom, <S%H9000><s%> its kings, <S%H4428><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> its princes, <S%H5387><s%> who <S%H834><s%> for [all] their might <S%H1369><s%> are laid <S%H5414><s%> with those slain <S%H2491><s%> by the sword; <S%H2719><s%> they will lie <S%H7901><s%> with the uncircumcised, <S%H6189><s%> and with those who go <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> to the pit. <S%H953><s%>

"There <S%H8033><s%> also are the chiefs <S%H5257><s%> of the north, <S%H6828><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> of them, and all <S%H3605><s%> the Sidonians, <S%H6722><s%> who <S%H834><s%> in spite of the terror <S%H2851><s%> resulting from their might, <S%H1369><s%> in shame <S%H954><s%> went <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> with the slain. <S%H2491><s%> So they lay <S%H7901><s%> down <S%H7901><s%> uncircumcised <S%H6189><s%> with those slain <S%H2491><s%> by the sword, <S%H2719><s%> and bore <S%H5375><s%> their disgrace <S%H3639><s%> with those who go <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> to the pit. <S%H953><s%>

"These Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> will see, <S%H7200><s%> and he will be comforted <S%H5162><s%> for all <S%H3605><s%> his multitude <S%H1995><s%> slain <S%H2491><s%> by the sword, <S%H2719><s%> [even] Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> his army, <S%H2428><s%>" declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God. <S%H3068><s%>

"Though <S%H3588><s%> I instilled <S%H5414><s%> a terror <S%H2851><s%> of him in the land <S%H776><s%> of the living, <S%H2416><s%> yet he will be made to lie <S%H7901><s%> down <S%H7901><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> [the] uncircumcised <S%H6189><s%> [along] with those slain <S%H2491><s%> by the sword, <S%H2719><s%> [even] Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> his multitude, <S%H1995><s%>" declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God. <S%H3068><s%>
